programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Amazon River Islands: The Floating Forest
programme.desc: The Anavilhanas and Mariua archipelagos are deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. Flooded for 6 months of the year, the islands are a fortress of submerged trees. / Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes  of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters
programme.desc: Madagascar is truly a weird and wonderful land. Isolated on an island of extreme and magical looking locations, life has adapted and diversified. With few predators, numbers have proliferated and natural selection has gone mad.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Vietnam: Phoenix from the Ashes
programme.desc: Around 10% of the world's species live in Vietnam, with tropical jungles fit to burst with wildlife. But less than 50 years ago, things were very different. During the war, Vietnam's forests were decimated, but as it always does, life fought back.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a space-age courier who's plugged in, turned on and buffed up to deliver the most important data of the 21st century, wet-wired directly into his brain! A rapid-fire roller coaster of action and high-impact imagery! Rating: R

programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which as mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid the box exploded killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Price of Murder
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Bad Medicine
programme.desc: Drug trafficking has spawned a violent and deadly criminal underground. It's providing a challenge to forensic investigators devoted to cracking drug rings.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: 13 all-star chefs go head-to-head to create pizzas inspired by countries from all over the world to test their knowledge of diverse ingredients and ethnic flavours. A tie between the red and blue teams is broken.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Both teams replicate six Hell's Kitchen entrees while kicking chefs out of the kitchen until only one remains. Chef Ramsay holds a `Cook For Your Life' challenge. Robyn, Giovanni, Milly, Barbie, Manda, and Elise must recreate his signature dish.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After Giovanni goes home, Michelle and Elise continue their heated fight. The chefs compete in a game meat challenge. Michelle sends up raw chicken, Barbie sends up raw duck and Manda sends up raw pork. The teams must decide who to nominate.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Elise and Michelle get into a heated argument that carries over into the next day. In the challenge, the chefs toss fish to collect ingredients. While Barbie annoys her team in punishment, the blue team heads to Vegas for a night of revelry.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Nine all-star chefs compete in a blind taste test challenge, in which they must identify herbs and spices with smashing consequences for their teammates. While one chef guesses, one chef sits in the hot seat and is hit with a mashed potato cannon.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: One of Ian’s most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel delivers the fabrication goods as he transplants an old 1948' cab onto a modern roll-off truck and creates one bad-ass trash truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel brings his wild fabrication skills into the world of Volkswagen bugs, as he turns a stock bug into a full custom.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel enters the motorcycle world as he tries to turn a childhood dream into a reality by building a wild chopper trike from the ground up.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms an old 1931 Ford jalopy into a street burning hot rod and attempts to bring back one of his wildest creations.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel digs out an old 1960’s dune buggy and brings it back to life with a modern twist.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.

programme.title: Andromeda: Machinery of the Mind
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew steps up to find out who killed a group of scientists.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken Out
programme.desc: Was Donovan Reidy deliberately run down and left to die? In 1995, 23-year-old Donovan Reidy was at a party when he got into a fight. A short while later, his bloodied body was found on the side of a major New Zealand highway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Mystery of the Homestead Murders
programme.desc: The quick mind of a country telephone exchange supervisor led to a horrific discovery at a NSW country homestead in 1978.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Body And Soul
programme.desc: Alex is not coping with Nick’s death and disappears from his friends’ lives.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: New Beginnings
programme.desc: Alex and Sandra face death in a blazing inferno. And dreams torment both Stevie and Tess.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Jodi reveals to Tess that they are sisters - but the news doesn't go over quite as Jodi hoped. Alex returns to the district...with his new fiance, Fiona, breaking Stevie's heart.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Truth Hurts
programme.desc: A STORY: Stevie discovers that Fiona was already engaged two weeks before she met Alex. B STORY: Tess asks Jodi to move into the big house - but the move proves too quick for the new relationship between the sisters and Jodi chooses to stay with Kate.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Kiss Of Death
programme.desc: Stevie's one night stand with Leo leads to Drovers losing its organic status as he takes revenge by spraying the land with chemicals. Jodi learns Rob's secret - he is on witness protection - bringing them closer together.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Luck By A Lady
programme.desc: Stevie literally gambles everything to save Drovers Run from being possessed by the bank. Hoping to impress Harry and ensure his ownership of Drovers Run, Sandra gazumps Tess's lamb sale.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison uses high tech sonar to help RCMP search for a missing camper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A snowmobiler trapped 30 metres down an icy crevasse says goodbye to his wife and family.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR team up with a local psychic to find a missing person.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR extracts a severely injured stunt snowmobiler. And later, teams search for two people swept down a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue helicopter long-lines an injured snowmobiler off a steep mountainside.

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Back Seat of My Jeep
programme.desc: Bumping in the night in the back seat of his jeep has caused all our problems! Kelsey says Justin cheats, doesn’t pay bills and is always angry. Justin argues that she’s a liar and doesn’t help around the house ever.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasn’t so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Operation Repo: I Don't Know What That Is
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy crash a raucous brew-fest to sneak an ATV away from a crowd of tipsy revelers. Then, Matt and Lou come face-to-face with a fraternity prank gone awry - these college kids have a sledgehammer, and they're not afraid to use it.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Zamboni?
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a debtor's tattooing session to reclaim his vehicle. Then, Sonia and Lyndah find themselves in an uncomfortable situation when they barge in on a couple engaging in some risqué role-playing.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Night Game
programme.desc: Karen attempts to stop Andi from falling back into her old ways when it comes to relationships. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Life, Soul, And Heart
programme.desc: Zac may find himself in serious problems as a mysterious woman appears and Karen confesses a huge secret. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Baby Girl
programme.desc: It's time for JoJo and his group, Blackout, to hit the studio and begin recording tracks for their record. However, JoJo, Zach and Reggie are discouraged by the list of producers Latchkey Recordings has available to them.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Comes Home
programme.desc: Rev and Justine return from visiting their adopted baby they'll soon be able to call their own. They get the family excited with the news that they will have a new sister living in the house in a few days.

programme.title: Run's House: Mind on the Road
programme.desc: Season Five kicks off when Rev Run home for a short visit in between gigs of his concert tour with good pal, Kid Rock.

programme.title: Run's House: Bonless Chicken Dinner
programme.desc: The episode begins with Rev Run on stage in what is his final performance of his tour with Kid Rock. Rev returns home and his hopes of getting his diet back on track are thwarted by Russy's new cooking hobby.

programme.title: Run's House: Pass The Frame

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Arks
programme.desc: Cut off from continents, remote islands have become floating arks, attracting migrating species and forging new ones. Take a privileged glimpse into the secret lives of the rare and exotic species that inhabit these lost worlds.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coral Islands
programme.desc: The reef systems that gave rise to coral islands support the vast majority of marine species on our planet, but they are under threat. Explore the delicate balance between exploiting and preserving these extraordinary natural wonders.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: Arthur: Pick a Car, Any Car/Jenna's Bedtime Blues
programme.desc: The family car is broken, and so is Arthur's heart. How can Mom and Dad even think of replacing it? It’s Muffy's annual slumber party, and Jenna is finally invited! But what if the other girls discover that she's an occasional bed-wetter?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Goes To Washington/Arthur's Mystery Envelope
programme.desc: D.W.'s on her way to Washington and she's bored by it all until she gets lost during a tour of the White House. Then, when Mr. Haney gives Arthur a sealed envelope to bring home to Mom, Arthur fears the worst.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Rules/Meet Binky
programme.desc: Writing your own name in graffiti all over the school wouldn't be very smart, right? Binky says he didn't do it, so detectives Fern and Buster are on the case. Then, Binky is the newest, hottest, hippest pop music craze in Elwood City.

programme.title: Arthur: Listen Up!/Arthur's New Old Vacation
programme.desc: When Francine's Bubbe passes away, Muffy tries to understand how she can help her friend. Then, when Arthur's family goes on the same vacation they take every year, he and Buster try to make it more exciting.

programme.title: An Arthur Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Arthur and his family are getting ready for Thanksgiving! But when Pal disappears to go on his own adventure, family, friends and the rest of Elwood City try to get Pal home. Will they be able to celebrate the best Thanksgiving yet?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Chicken Pox/Sick As A Dog
programme.desc: The circus is in town and the whole family's excited—until Arthur gets CHICKEN POX! Will he recover in time? Then, Arthur's worst fears come true when poor, sick Pal has to sleep overnight at the vet's office. Could it be something he did?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Rides Again/Arthur Makes The Team
programme.desc: In D.W.’s heart lurks one big, gnawing desire--TO GET RID OF THOSE TRAINING WHEELS! Then, can Coach Frensky work with a baseball team where everyone is fighting about who gets to be pitcher and no one wants to practice?

programme.title: Arthur: Big Horns George/Bleep
programme.desc: George is inspired to write and perform his own blues song when he's introduced to the music of Koko Taylor. And, D.W. overhears a mysterious word she doesn’t know the meaning of. Can D.W. risk the consequences of blurting out <"BLEEP!">?

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Getting Home
programme.desc: In this film, Bomber Command personnel and a Luftwaffe pilot take the viewer through the frightening reality of fighting in the skies as they try to get a damaged bomber home.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: In 1945, Germany is crumbly on both fronts. The Western Allies cross the Rhine and take most of Germany, while the Red Army quickly advances into Berlin. After Hitler's suicide, Germany surrenders and is divided among the allied powers.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly. The SS implements the Holocaust.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: It's been seven years since April met Dean in a chat room at the age of thirteen. During that time, Dean would often disappear for months at a time. Can Nev and Max help April find Dean? (S6, ep15)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jasmine & Mike
programme.desc: Jasmine has been texting with Mike for two years and thinks he could be the perfect step-father for her son. Although they live only 15 minutes apart, the pair have yet to meet up in person. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James
programme.desc: After a three-year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with love-of-her-life James, and reveal her secret. Now in the same state, James seems more elusive than ever. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Chitara & Priscilla
programme.desc: Chitara took a big leap and came out to her family when she met Priscilla online, but Priscilla ended their relationship unexpectedly. Now Chitara is determined to find out what happened. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Felicia
programme.desc: Mike and Felicia met online and soon hit it off. After agreeing to meet, Felicia stood Mike up, offering only thin excuses. Can Mike trust Felicia - or will he end up disappointed?

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Aaron Moves On
programme.desc: Two new Exes crash into the villa, bringing fresh hope for Aaron and torment for Becca. Maisie hits an all-time low, while Harriette suffers a meltdown and Sean and Jack come to blows.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 105
programme.desc: Fitz hopes that confessing his love to his best friend Michelle will lead to love. Shelly thinks that her "clown" persona won't turn off her best friend as she asks him to be her boyfriend.

programme.desc: A report that focuses on the murders in Spokane, Washington over a period of a little more than two years (1997 - 1999) of at least a dozen women, mostly prostitutes.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Texas Confidential
programme.desc: A report on the 1997 murder of Doris Angleton, the wife of a successful Houston, Texas bookie. Doris’ husband Bob who claimed that his brother Roger was Doris’ killer, was tried for the crime in state court and acquitted. But the case did not end there.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Precious Angels
programme.desc: A report on the brutal murders in a Dallas, Texas suburb of Darlie and Darin Routier’s two sons -- Devon, 6 and Damon, 5. Darlie who claims that the boys were killed by an intruder, suffered serious knife wounds to her throat.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live To Tell: River's Edge
programme.desc: On January 8, 2000, college students Danielle Keener and Dan Zapp were on a date, walking along a river’s edge outside York, Pennsylvania, when they were kidnapped at gunpoint by a man in a pick-up truck.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon buys a new TV from Madam Murray. Wade suggests the Roy Rooster Fan Club be changed to the Wade Duck fan club.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield and Penelope imagine what it would be like to be married.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Odielocks/Quack to the Future/Beddy Buy
programme.desc: Garfield tells the story about Odielocks, and the three bears./Orson wishes he had a time machine./When Garfield breaks his bed, Jon buys a new one.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie go sailing on Jon’s new boat and a shark shows up. Michael can’t scare anyone until he enters the farmyard.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon’s new next-door neighbor is a cat hater and Garfield has to find out why. All of the farmyards are caught in a repeating cycle of zany bits.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Scrambler tells Spud that Bob is putting together the machinery for Farmer Pickles’ sunflower oil factory, he decides that putting things together is something he’d be very good at. So he heads off to the factory to lend a hand.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a lean-to for Mr Beasley’s allotment. Wendy offers to pick up the materials from JJ’s yard, while Bob makes a start on the cement floor. But before he can leave, Bob gets a call from Mr Dixon, who needs a hole in his roof fixed urgently.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop is keen to enter the town’s snowman competition, but a burst pipe outside Mr Sabatini’s needs fixing. Scoop is anxious when he sees the snowman that Mr Sabatini has made for the competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building Sunflower Valley’s first geodesic dome. As Wendy has organised the dome and knows how it all fits together, Bob suggests that she might like to take charge of the job. Reluctantly Wendy agrees.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building a pedestrian crossing. Mrs Percival, meanwhile, has asked Molly to paint a mural of a jungle scene in the school playground.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are installing a bull-rush water recycling system to clean water from Farmer Pickles’ cottage. The clean water will be used to water Farmer Pickles new orchard. Bob explains that everything needs to be built in order – it’s a process.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The Team are converting Mr Sabatini’s windmill into a café. Roley is rolling the ground flat for all the tables and chairs while Bob makes the awnings. Roley hits trouble when molehills keep appearing where he’s just been rolling.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Sabatini has decided to move from Bobsville to set up the Sunflower Valley bakery. Bob and the team are going to build him a new house close to the river. Muck asks if Spud can tag along as he’s been telling him exciting stories.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang leave to convert a house into two separate flats. Mr Bentley, meanwhile, has been left in charge of The Mayor’s dog.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is repairing a leaking water tank at the school, when he discovers bats in the belfry. He tapes up the tank temporarily, but says the bats will need a new home as they are a protected species.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The whole town is practicing for an egg and spoon race, which Mrs Percival has organised. Trix decides to enter, but unfortunately she practices with fresh eggs and in her usual haste she manages to make a great mess in JJ’s yard.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has a day off and he takes a trip to Farmer Pickles farm to take some photographs for the town photography competition. Wendy, meanwhile, has been called to the school hall where a pipe has burst, threatening the competition.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Trapped by Time
programme.desc: Liam and Renee learn of a facility where time travelers from the future are being held. They try to learn from them what happens to the Taelons. Sandoval's wife is used as a pawn to gain important information from him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Strange assaults and several deaths may be related to a Doors/Taelon joint venture where Taelon core energy was used to heal people. It appears that the energy is being sucked back out of the patients.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Hearts and Minds
programme.desc: When Renee's boyfriend appears to her while he is imprisoned on the mother ship, Liam theorizes a special energy bond between the pair. Zo'or is upset by the human's betrayal and bans all humans from the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Epiphany
programme.desc: The Taelons announce that they will all go into death stasis and wait on the mother ship for humans to discover how to create core energy and revive them. Zo'or and Da'an don't trust each other to be the last to submit to stasis.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Horizons
programme.desc: Eight Taelons are killed when protectors' implants are re-calibrated with a new imperative to kill instead of protect Taelons. They fear the Jiridians have found a way to control the CVIs. Meanwhile, their core energy continues to deplete.

programme.title: The Lost World: Salvation
programme.desc: Summerlee saves an unconscious child from a river with CPR, which convinces the village leader they are witches. They will be burned on the stake unless they can influence the council otherwise.

programme.title: The Lost World: Blood Lust
programme.desc: Marguerite and Professor Challenger must save Roxton when he gets bit by a diseased man and transforms into a Vampire. Meanwhile, Veronica proves to two men that she doesn't belong to either of them.

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of Time
programme.desc: Marguerite, the reincarnation of the Druid's priestess, must fulfill her destiny by retrieving emeralds that will save them. Veronica has difficulty giving up a baby she has grown attached to.

programme.title: The Lost World: Paradise Found
programme.desc: While searching for Veronica's parents, the explorers find themselves in a hidden land of paradise. They must resist temptation when they discover a magical fruit that promises immortality.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Beast Within
programme.desc: Malone goes after a healer that's been filled with the spirit of a demon in exchange for safe release from the village. The girls must set their differences aside and learn to trust each other.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Actors Laila Rouass and Charles Dale battle their way around the north of England for eccentric antiques they hope will turn a profit. James Lewis and Paul Laidlaw are there to help as they travel from York via Leeds to auction in Chertsey.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: John Barrowman and Myleene Klass, with David Barby and David Harper, hunt for antiques to turn a profit. On the way, they visit Bristol, Chepstow, Newport and Cardiff before winding up at auction in Froncysylite by the Welsh-English border.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: David Harper and David Barby help out former gold medalists Robin Cousins and Tessa Sanderson, ready to hit the road with £400. From Bury St Edmonds, with stops at the Whipple Museum and the Fan Museum, who will win the day in Greenwich?

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Fern Britton and Phil Vickery take a trip around Devon with Mark Stacey and James Braxton. The teams hunt treasures to make a profit in Crewkerne, Somerset, Fern learns more about Agatha Christie and Phil gets basic with bread making.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: DJs Janice Long and Ken Bruce embark on a trip around Oxfordshire with Christina Trevanion and Paul Laidlaw. They're looking for antiques that will make money at auction, but spare a moment for buses and the early days of music recording.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Mystery in Room 813
programme.desc: On November 13, 1996, at a Sheraton hotel east of Los Angeles, 27-year-old Sandra Orellana of Houston, on a business trip with her 33-year-old boss Robert Salazar, went over a balcony and met her death.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Relentless
programme.desc: A woman wages a psychological war against the person she believes killed her daughter.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Whether a true crime television show influenced the investigation of an alleged rape and murder case in Atlanta.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Hamptons
programme.desc: A report on the October 2001 murder of Wall Street tycoon Ted Ammon who was embroiled in a bitter divorce battle with his wife Generosa who later died of breast cancer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Jeffrey MacDonald: Fight for Truth
programme.desc: A report on the 1970 murders of U.S. Army Doctor Jeffrey MacDonald’s pregnant wife and two daughters at their Fort Bragg home. Having served 25 years in prison for the murders, MacDonald still proclaims his innocence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family's Shame
programme.desc: The broadcast presents accounts of people who suffer the reality that a close relative has committed murder and endure the struggle between family ties and civic responsibility.
